header1:
Bookkeeping 
at just one click away.
h2: More time for your business, less time for bookkeeping.
p1: We support you in building your organisation, whatever the type. SRL,SRL-D, PFA, PFI, II, IF.
p1nd: We can support the setup and maintenance of your mandatory accounting records and financial records.
p1rd: We help you save time and avoid errors, so you can focus on what matters most to you.
p1th: Let us take the hassle out of staff administration and leave you to focus on what you do best—running your business.
p2: No matter your industry, we’ve got the tools you need to succeed.
p3: We are here for you. Your accounting needs can be handled quickly, efficiently, and accurately by expert professionals who have the experience to get it done. Our team provides outstanding service at competitive prices.
p3nd: Our accounting experts offer a range of services to help you streamline the accounting process so you can spend more time doing what you do best: growing your business.
p3rd: We also provide a full suite of accounting services for independent contractors, freelancers, and small business owners.
p3th: If you are not a Romanian resident and plan to open a business here, we can assist you with the necessary steps to open your company and draw up all the necessary documents to operate in the country.
p3st: We are here for you. Your accounting needs can be handled quickly, efficiently, and accurately by expert professionals who have the experience to get it done. Our team provides outstanding service at competitive prices.

p1services: With our support, your startup business will have the best possible start. Our consultant will handle all of the complex registration procedures on your behalf.
p1ndservices: We offer the support you need to record your documents and set up financial records so that they are up-to-date and accurate. We also maintain all mandatory accounting records.
p1rdservices: Avoid costly mistakes and complications by calling in the experts. We offer an objective and straightforward consultation for the best tax treatment for your situation.
p1thservices: We’ve got you covered. It doesn’t matter if you need to draft a contract or complete a payroll, our team of specialists will make sure that your job is done correctly and on time.
b1: Establishments SRL, SRL-D, PFA, PFI, IF, II Associations, Foundations
b3: Establishment of commercial companies on the Romanian territory and the provision of all necessary services for non-residents
b7: Modification, extension, recoding and deletion of the object of activity
b9: Support for setting up financial accounting records
b11: VAT journal, balance sheet, mandatory accounting records, balance sheet
b12: Preparation, verification and certification of financial statements
b13: Completion and submission of monthly/quarterly tax and tax returns
b14: Preparation, verification and certification of liquidation balance sheets
b20: Tax on income obtained from Romania by non-residents
b29: Drafting of individual employment contracts and additional documents
b30: Completing and registering the register for employee records (REVISAL)
b33: Elaboration of reports for the analysis of personnel costs
b34: Assistance for the preparation of job descriptions
dpp: Convenient and dynamic accounting services are both a necessity for most businesses and an indispensable strategic component of any business. We offer a complete selection of accounting services at great prices and rates so you can be sure that we will be available to provide you with comprehensive services.
dppnd: Our accounting experts offer a range of services to help you streamline the accounting process so you can spend more time doing what you do best: growing your business.
dpprd: We are also there for freelancers. We offer the support and promptness needed by independent entrepreneurs, and are adaptable and open. Rest assured that our team provides the services you need to simplify your effort, reduce stress, and easily achieve your goals. We want to make freelance work easier for you; we care about your success!
dppth: If you are not a Romanian resident and plan to open a business here, we can assist you with the necessary steps to open your company and draw up all the necessary documents to operate in the country.
